trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about the specified icon or cursor

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves information about the specified icon or cursor

target.mrk: Retrieves information about the specified icon or cursor

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Handle to the icon or cursor. To retrieve information about a standard icon or cursor, use $IDC_* constants.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the icon or cursor.
To retrieve information about a standard icon or cursor, use $IDC_* constants.

target.mrk: Handle to the icon or cursor.
To retrieve information about a standard icon or cursor, use $IDC_* constants.

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: The array that contains the following information:

seg-source.mrk: The array that contains the following information:

target.mrk: The array that contains the following information:

trans-unit.source: [0] - A value of 1 specifies an icon; 0 specifies a cursor.

seg-source.mrk: [0] - A value of 1 specifies an icon; 0 specifies a cursor.

target.mrk: [0] - A value of 1 specifies an icon; 0 specifies a cursor.

trans-unit.source: [1] - The x-coordinate of the cursor's hot spot.

seg-source.mrk: [1] - The x-coordinate of the cursor's hot spot.

target.mrk: [1] - The x-coordinate of the cursor's hot spot.

trans-unit.source: [2] - The y-coordinate of the cursor's hot spot.

seg-source.mrk: [2] - The y-coordinate of the cursor's hot spot.

target.mrk: [2] - The y-coordinate of the cursor's hot spot.

trans-unit.source: [3] - A handle to the icon bitmask bitmap.

seg-source.mrk: [3] - A handle to the icon bitmask bitmap.

target.mrk: [3] - A handle to the icon bitmask bitmap.

trans-unit.source: [4] - A handle to the icon color bitmap.

seg-source.mrk: [4] - A handle to the icon color bitmap.

target.mrk: [4] - A handle to the icon color bitmap.

trans-unit.source: [5] - The icon or cursor resource bits.

seg-source.mrk: [5] - The icon or cursor resource bits.

target.mrk: [5] - The icon or cursor resource bits.

trans-unit.source: [6] - The fully qualified path of the module.

seg-source.mrk: [6] - The fully qualified path of the module.

target.mrk: [6] - The fully qualified path of the module.

trans-unit.source: [7] - The fully qualified path of the resource.

seg-source.mrk: [7] - The fully qualified path of the resource.

target.mrk: [7] - The fully qualified path of the resource.

trans-unit.source: Sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_GetIconInfoEx() creates bitmaps [3] and [4].

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetIconInfoEx() creates bitmaps [3] and [4].

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetIconInfoEx() creates bitmaps [3] and [4].

trans-unit.source: The calling application must manage these bitmaps and delete them when they are no longer necessary.

seg-source.mrk: The calling application must manage these bitmaps and delete them when they are no longer necessary.

target.mrk: The calling application must manage these bitmaps and delete them when they are no longer necessary.

trans-unit.source: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

seg-source.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

target.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.
